name: Meta Finance Elements Verse
description: MFEV operates on its proprietary Layer 1 blockchain named the MFEV Blockchain. This platform utilizes a unique Proof-of-Distribution (PoD) consensus mechanism, designed to ensure a fair distribution of transaction fees and rewards across validators, delegators, and smart contract creators. Unlike traditional Proof-of-Work or Proof-of-Stake systems, the MFEV Blockchain's PoD model enhances network security and incentivizes community participation and innovation. The blockchain architecture focuses on improving scalability, reducing transaction costs, and increasing transaction speeds, making it suitable for developers and users looking for efficient blockchain solutions.
